scenario_text.value: What?!

It’s our evolution energy!
And so much of it!
What?! That’s great!

If we can use this power, we might be ready
for Piemon!

Well done, Falcomon!
I knew we could count on you!
It was nothing.
Don’t be so humble! It’s really impressive!

Minoru and Falcomon are back to their old
selves!
Yeah, or maybe even more so?

(But it was good of Falcomon to find a reason
to check things out...)

(And it was Minoru who suggested we use the
camera.)
(I better thank him for it.)
Thank you too, Minoru.
I knew what we’d find.
You noticed, Agumon?
Thank you too, Minoru.

Thank you too, Minoru.
You suggested using the camera.
Yeah? Well, anyone would have...

We’ve been using it since we got here.
It’s only natural to think of it...
Are you embarrassed?
He is.
I’m! Not! Embarrassed!
I knew what we’d find.

(It’s awkward to just blurt out praise.
Maybe I should joke around a little.)
Well, I knew we should use the camera too!
Of course. There’d be no reason you wouldn’t.

And you’ve brought us this far, too!
You’ve been incredible, really.

(When they put it that way I feel like a jerk
for trying to fool them.)
You noticed, Agumon?

(It’s awkward to just blurt out praise.
Maybe I should turn it around on them.)
Did you notice it too, Agumon?

I knew there was something strange, but
I couldn’t find the right words.

Falcomon and Minoru were great! And for both
of them to figure it out together like that!
What? Me, too?

Yes! It was you who suggested we use the
camera! That was impressive!
Hehehe... Nah, it wasn’t like that!
(Minoru’s enjoying the attention.)

(If I’d known he’d smile like that, I should
have gone ahead and praised him, too.)

Piemon’s tough, but if we get tough too, I’m
sure we can win, right?
